ygData.subject: Re: Foraging - a question
ygData.msgSnippet: A woodelfs forage skill does not go above 40. Unless you get it as a skill for your class of character. All Woodelfs can forage. As for a Bard, I am not sure
ygData.messageBody:
A woodelfs forage skill does not go above 40. Unless you get it as a skill
for your class of character. All Woodelfs can forage. As for a Bard, I am
not sure on that. I am currently stuck at 40 too when my lvl would allow me
to be at 80.

Maraxus (E'ci realm 15th lvl)

>From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Re: Foraging - a question
>Date: Wed, 28 Apr 1999 19:41:36 -0700
>
>From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
>
> >I've noticed my Foraging skill hasnt gone up past 40 or so. Do bards
> >have a skill cap on this skill? I'm a Human bard also. Maybe you wood
> >elf bards can get your foraging maxed (5xlvl+5).
>
>I'm a Wood Elf bard, now level 22. I forage constantly, and my skill has
>never gone up. At level 12 it showed up as available for training, but when
>I tried to seed it it said that it was already at maximum level. I
>reported this as a bug.
>
> - Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
>
